description: Build a comprehensive two-sided marketplace with booking management, payment processing, review systems, and trust/safety features - following Airbnb's proven marketplace architecture.

frontend.rationale: Airbnb uses React-based architecture for complex booking flows and dynamic pricing. Next.js provides excellent SEO for listing discovery.

backend.rationale: Node.js for high-concurrency booking requests. GraphQL for flexible data fetching across complex booking relationships.

database.rationale: PostgreSQL for transactional booking data, Redis for search caching, Elasticsearch for location-based search and filtering.

payments.rationale: Stripe Connect for marketplace payments with automatic splits. Multiple processors for global coverage and payout flexibility.

search.rationale: Elasticsearch for complex location and filter searches. Redis for search result caching. ML for personalized recommendations.

messaging.rationale: Real-time messaging between hosts and guests. Redis for message queuing. Push notifications for mobile engagement.

questions.text: What type of marketplace will you build?

choices.label: Accommodation marketplace (Airbnb style)
choices.impact: Booking calendar, property management, guest screening, cleaning coordination

choices.label: Service marketplace (TaskRabbit/Uber style)
choices.impact: Real-time matching, service provider tracking, instant booking

choices.label: Product marketplace (Etsy/Amazon style)
choices.impact: Inventory management, shipping integration, product catalogs

choices.label: Event marketplace (Eventbrite style)
choices.impact: Event scheduling, ticket management, capacity planning

questions.impact: Determines core business logic, booking system complexity, and feature priorities

questions.text: How complex should your booking system be?

choices.label: Simple booking (instant booking, fixed pricing)
choices.impact: Basic calendar integration, simple payment flow

choices.label: Advanced booking (availability, dynamic pricing)
choices.impact: Complex availability engine, pricing algorithms, booking rules

choices.label: Enterprise booking (multi-property, bulk booking)
choices.impact: Multi-unit management, group bookings, enterprise features

questions.impact: Affects booking engine complexity, pricing system, and calendar management

questions.text: What payment model will you use?

choices.label: Commission-based (Airbnb style)
choices.impact: Split payments, escrow system, commission calculation

choices.label: Subscription + transaction fees
choices.impact: Subscription billing, reduced transaction fees, tier management

choices.label: Listing fees + optional features
choices.impact: Upfront listing charges, premium feature payments

choices.label: Free with premium upgrades
choices.impact: Feature gating, premium listing promotion, enhanced tools

questions.impact: Determines payment architecture, revenue calculation, and financial reporting needs

questions.text: What trust and safety features do you need?
questions.impact: Affects user onboarding complexity, verification systems, and operational overhead

questions.text: Do you need global marketplace features (multiple currencies, languages)?
questions.impact: Requires multi-currency support, localization, regional payment methods, and compliance

metrics.marketplace: Gross merchandise value (GMV), take rate, booking conversion
metrics.growth: Supply growth, demand growth, market balance
metrics.quality: Review scores, repeat usage, cancellation rates
metrics.operations: Support ticket volume, dispute resolution time, fraud rate

risks.mitigation: Focus on specific geographic markets, incentivize early adopters, manual curation
Use established payment platforms, implement fraud detection, regular security audits
Robust verification processes, insurance partnerships, 24/7 support team
Search optimization, caching strategies, A/B testing of algorithms
Legal partnerships, compliance automation, market-specific features

successFactors: Strong supply and demand balance in initial markets
Effective dispute resolution and customer support

competitorAnalysis.Airbnb: Accommodation focus, global scale, strong host tools
competitorAnalysis.Etsy: Handmade products, creative community, seller tools
